member.name: T:VVVV.Nodes.Generic.Copier`1
member.summary: Copies values or spread of values. Used in nodes which need to copy data.
member.typeparam: The type of value this copier is able to copy.

member.name: F:VVVV.Nodes.Generic.Copier`1.Immutable
member.summary: Returns a copier for immutable types.

member.name: M:VVVV.Nodes.Generic.Copier`1.Copy(`0)
member.summary: Creates a copy of the given value.

member.name: M:VVVV.Nodes.Generic.Copier`1.CopySpread(VVVV.PluginInterfaces.V2.ISpread{`0})
member.summary: Creates a copy of the given spread.
